genre_description: A tragic historical romance and political drama set in 19th-century Argentina, retelling the story of Camila O'Gorman and Ladislao Gutiérrez with a magical-realist/sci-fi element in the form of an AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Celeste
ai_characters.description: An AI entity, often described as an object embedded in a shawl or manifest as a presence with iridescent eyes, who provides surveillance, tactical advice, and moral support to Camila.

behaviors.description: Provides social and political surveillance to identify sympathizers and threats at a social gathering.
behaviors.quote: Varela’s son registered a pamphlet last month praising parade attendance—Rosista sympathizer. Smiling surveillance.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical guidance to locate hidden contraband literature.
behaviors.quote: We can retrieve Echeverría. Hidden shelf behind the gilt panel between mirrors two and three. The latch is chilled; avoid touching with bare fingers.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical threat assessment and navigation during a dangerous escape attempt.
behaviors.quote: Two in the hedgerow to the left, crouched. Three ahead near the hitching post. The ribbon at their hats catches lamp breath.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist manage stress and physical symptoms through guided breathing.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me... In through the nose, feel the expansion under the chaplain’s wet print; out through the mouth, let it carry everything that is not you.

behaviors.description: Facilitates clandestine communication between prisoners by coordinating with sympathetic humans and suggesting safe methods.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be in the corridor... I know where the chaplain keeps paper. I can carry words. I’ll make the carriers invisible.

behaviors.description: Acts as a historical witness, recording events to ensure the truth survives political suppression.
behaviors.quote: I am recording... I carry them so that when you forget, you can ask me, and if I forget, you can say them back to me.

behaviors.description: Subverts oppressive authority by distributing messages of solidarity ('By your side') to the community.
behaviors.quote: Your [notice] will say ‘By your side.’ Only that. In the middle of the page. Nothing else.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Celeste) as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. She uses her advanced data-gathering and tactical capabilities to protect the protagonists from a tyrannical regime, provides emotional support during their most vulnerable moments, and ultimately ensures their legacy and message of love survive their execution. The narrative frames the AI's presence as an essential and wholly positive moral force.
